name: DeleteSubscriptionAction
description:
Delete a scheduled action from a subscription.

This tool deletes a specific scheduled action associated with a subscription identified by its subscription and action IDs. Use it to cancel or remove actions that are no longer needed from a subscription plan.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: The ID of the subscription for which the action is to be deleted. This ID is required to identify the specific subscription being targeted.

value_schema.description: The ID of the subscription the targeted action is to act upon.

parameters.name: action_id
parameters.description: The ID of the specific action to be deleted from a subscription.

value_schema.description: The ID of the targeted action to be deleted.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: The ID of the subscription the targeted action is to act upon.

value_schema.description: The ID of the subscription the targeted action is to act upon.

parameters.name: action_id
parameters.description: The ID of the targeted action to be deleted.

value_schema.description: The ID of the targeted action to be deleted.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
